query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS referral_program (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  referrer_user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  referral_code VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  referred_email VARCHAR(255),
  referred_user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
  reward_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'free_month',
  reward_granted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  reward_granted_at TIMESTAMP,
  completed_assessment BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  completed_assessment_at TIMESTAMP,
  subscribed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  subscribed_at TIMESTAMP,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  referrer_user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  referral_code VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  referred_email VARCHAR(255),

  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
  reward_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'free_month',

  reward_granted_at TIMESTAMP,
  completed_assessment BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  completed_assessment_at TIMESTAMP,
  subscribed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  subscribed_at TIMESTAMP,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
